website_summaries.verdict: These colorful and cheery Building Block birthday candles are a cute way to top any LEGO lover’s special cake.
pros: 2 orange, blue, red, and green candles per set
cons: Each set is a little on the pricy side

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We put these LEGO-themed candles on our son's birthday cake for his 7th birthday party. All the kids loved them! They resembled real LEGO's and came in a variety of different shapes and colors! We put a LEGO man on top of the cake, and put the narrowest LEGO candle in his hand. It fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria N.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive alert!!
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for Betty Crocker candles. Little bit taller than AA size batteries. Candles are cute and went well with the LEGO themed party cake but wish they were more reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mitr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lego fans birthdays
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our sons Lego themed birthday party. He was super happy to see the candles to his cake looked like his favorite toy legos. Kept them to reuse as he refused to throw them away. Would recommend to any Lego fan
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: so cute!
customer_reviews.text: these were so cute for my sons lego theme birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Koree Lewis Kerby

customer_reviews.title: Cute but stuck together and had to be broken apart
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son's lego-themed birthday. Many of them were stuck together and had to be forcibly separated, breaking them. The are really cute candles but overall disappointing and not a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a lego theme!
customer_reviews.text: We had these for a lego themed party. They’re thick and sturdy. We are going to be able to get multiple uses out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: They are candles. They lit and looked cute. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are candles. They lit and looked cute. I way overpaid for these given I used them once. My kid was excited, so I guess I can justify the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 7 CANDLES
customer_reviews.text: So if I order candles for my son's 8th Birthday and the package clearly states 8 but there are only 7 candles in the unopened package and I spend almost $10.00 on the said package it is a little frustrating to be one candle short for his Lego themed Birthday cake...
customer_reviews.author: JPP

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They showed up a bit smudge like they had been sitting in the heat. Had no time to return or would have.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Glover

customer_reviews.title: Worked but wish it was thinner
customer_reviews.text: Hard to stick into a cake with fondont. Wish there was a thinner end to the candle. Still worked
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa M. Ruhl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for a kid who loves legos or is having a Lego movie themed bday. Fun.
customer_reviews.author: DanielleH

customer_reviews.title: Made the cake
customer_reviews.text: We had a Lego party for our 4 year old grandson. These candles along with the gummy lego building blocks made his cake perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great for one use
customer_reviews.text: Orange ones were broken but still used them for bday for husband bday. Melted quickly. Not able to save for second use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These were super cute. Easy to light. Worked great for my son’s LEGO party.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Morris

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: These are do cute for my son's 8th birthday. However with one broke, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lynndel

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: Very creative candles! My son loved them! Great for the Lego birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Morris

customer_reviews.title: Melted candles
customer_reviews.text: First thing- I didn’t receive this item on time. Second thing- when I did receive it it was all melted and there was no way I would have been able to use them anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: As expected, very cute
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a Lego themed party. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: These candles looked great on the cake...my son loved them and the kids were excited as well. It’s a bit pricey for just 8 candles but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so all in all I was disappointed in them for what they cost
customer_reviews.text: The colors were not as vibrant as pictured. I just assumed they were a little bigger, so all in all I was disappointed in them for what they cost.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Walkok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a LEGO themed party and these candles were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lee Macias

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Colorful Candles
customer_reviews.text: Even though they don't say Lego they certainly look like them. For any Lego-loving kid (or in this case my 20-yo who still loves Legos). Great for a themed cake and/or party.
customer_reviews.author: L. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Fun building block/ LEGO candles
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors, fun design. These were perfect for my son’s LEGO themed birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: Price was way to high but my son loved the candels
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I love these Lego candles
customer_reviews.text: I love these Lego candles. We will be using them in a couple of days for my grandson's Lego themed 5th birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The candles look like a lego brick with a wick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Empty Package Delivered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item 8/26/18... the package arrived very quickly. However, the package was empty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Girls Lego party
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and different sizes. Worked great on Lego Cake!
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: He loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my son's lego birthday cake. He loved them!
customer_reviews.author: BritC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these were just great little candles! and the fit a lego theme perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jen L

customer_reviews.title: Good candles and bright colors but with shipping they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Good candles and bright colors but with shipping they are very expensive and I wish I could have found them in a store to save cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect candles for LEGO theme
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but fit the theme of my grandson’s Dinosaur LEGO (his idea) birthday party so I HAD to buy them of course. Pretty thick and not delicate. You get about 2 of each size and color. Some are twice as wide as the the others. You should be able to see on this cake. I didn’t use all of them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loved them, I do think they are a little pricey but worth it to make Him happy
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite M. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition but costly
customer_reviews.text: UT for the fact that they are Lego... They are expensive. I actually laid Legos on the cake and could of forego these.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego theme!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun candles for a Lego themed birthday party. My son loved them! There are only eight candles in a pack so will need additional packs of older.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Used for my son's 5th birthday, lego themed, these were perfect
customer_reviews.author: Peters

customer_reviews.title: Neat candles!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality candles and went well with a roblox theme cake. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but overpriced and broke immediately when I opened package
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to his Ninjago cake and LEGO themed Birthday Party
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Had a Lego Ninjago party for an 8 year old boy. Could not find candles with the exact theme. These went perfect on his Lego Ninjago cake.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Cute for Lego party
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect addition to my sins cake at his Lego party. It helped add an important little detail to the party.
customer_reviews.author: luke's mom

customer_reviews.title: ... youngest is a LEGO fanatic and these were a perfect addition to his LEGO themed birthday party
customer_reviews.text: My youngest is a LEGO fanatic and these were a perfect addition to his LEGO themed birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for lego themed party and I cleaned them well to re use them
customer_reviews.author: mandyBee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One arrived broken, but was able to piece it together. Price is way too high though.
customer_reviews.author: LadyG

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, unique candles.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Adorable candles for my child's Lego Movie party.
customer_reviews.author: Kitkat
